author: Discovery
description:
Watch some of the most creative builds from this episode of the Red Bull Soapbox race, from a bathtub soapbox with a built-in shower head, to an alien inside a UFO, and more!

Stream Full Episodes of Red Bull Soapbox Race:
https://www.discoveryplus.com/shows/red-bull-soapbox-race/9a0edf41-c0d6-4e9b-9533-43f9656a51a9

#Discovery #RedBullSoapboxRace 

About Red Bull Soapbox Race: 
Red Bull Soapbox Race has a new series hosted by NASCAR Hall of Famer Dale Earnhardt Jr. and motorsports announcer Mike Bagley. The show follows amateur teams as they design and build gravity-powered soapbox racers, taking on intricate downhill courses filled with unexpected obstacles. It's a global showcase of ingenuity and speed!

Each episode features races in cities around the world, including London, Des Moines, Dallas, Edmonton, Johannesburg, Madrid, and Sao Paulo. Competitors from all backgrounds step into the role of daredevil engineers, pushing the limits of design and speed as they navigate nearly ha
title: Best Races from the Wild Soapbox Safari | Red Bull Soapbox Race | Discovery
